subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Gaël Monfils saved a match point to edge Gilles Simon, 4-6, 7-6 (4), 6-4, in an all-French match and reach the Open Sud de France final in Montpellier.
snippet: The defending champion Gaël Monfils saved a match point to edge Gilles Simon, 4-6, 7-6 (4), 6-4, in an all-French match and reach the Open Sud de France final in Montpellier.
